name: Imanova Media Services
tag_list: ecommerce-outsourcing, facebook-shop, e-commerce-services, e-commerce-solutions, facebook-e-commerce, entertainment-industry
overview:
Imanova offers e-commerce outsourcing services for leading brands and companies. From platform development, through supply chain mgmt., customer services or e-fullfilment.

Imanova also develops Facebook e-shops, completely customized for clients needs. The full buying experience runs inside FB, from catalog browse to payment.

At this moment, Imanova manage the eCommerce services of the main nationwide TV channels in Spain and a few leading brands such as Osborne (food and beverage) owner of TORO de Osborne, known as the Bull of Spain. You can see more on their website.

Imanova also has their own eCommerce business, like www.funforface.com (to be launched in October 18th 2010), a facebook e-shop with personalized products for facebook lovers, for facebookers.

Imanova is looking for aliances with similar European and US companies in order to expand their range of services and customer base.
